revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Resolution Cave |image = [[File:Resolution Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Resolution Cave. |tokens = 1,250,000 |location = West of Poni Meadow / South of Poni Gauntlet }}
<!--T:2--> '''Resolution Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 17,114,462 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Veteran (female).png|40px]] Veteran Leticia || [[File:Ribombee.png|40px]] Ribombee, [[File:Bewear.png|40px]] Bewear |- | [[File:Alolan Dugtrio.png|40px]] Alolan Dugtrio || [[File:Backpacker (female).png|40px]] Backpacker Maria || [[File:Manectric.png|40px]] Manectric |- | [[File:Druddigon.png|40px]] Druddigon || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Travis || [[File:Alolan Dugtrio.png|40px]] Alolan Dugtrio, [[File:Mudsdale.png|40px]] Mudsdale |- |}
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Golbat.png|50px]] Golbat ||rowspan=2|<center>85,572,310 ||rowspan=3 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Noivern.png|50px]] Noivern |- | [[File:Guzzlord.png|50px]] Guzzlord || <center>96,673,816 |- |}
